gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with Apper Academy
gettingStarted.description: Learn how to use Apper Academy to master app development through hands-on learning

sections.title: What is Apper Academy?
sections.content: Apper Academy is your personal learning companion for mastering app development. Think of it as your friendly tutor who guides you step-by-step through creating amazing apps. Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to improve your skills, Apper Academy makes learning fun and easy.
highlights: Interactive lessons that teach by doing
Real coding exercises with instant feedback
Progress tracking to see how far you've come
Achievement system to celebrate your wins

sections.title: How to Get Started
sections.content: Starting your learning journey is super easy! Just follow these simple steps:

steps.title: Choose Your First Lesson
steps.description: Browse through the available lessons on the main page. Start with 'Introduction to Apper' if you're new, or pick any topic that interests you.

steps.title: Read and Learn
steps.description: Each lesson has clear explanations and examples. Take your time to read through the content - there's no rush!

steps.title: Practice with Exercises
steps.description: Try the hands-on exercises to practice what you've learned. Don't worry if you make mistakes - that's how we learn!

steps.title: Track Your Progress
steps.description: Watch your progress bar fill up as you complete lessons. It feels great to see how much you've accomplished!

sections.title: Understanding Each Feature
sections.content: Let's explore what each part of Apper Academy does for you:

features.name: Lessons
features.description: Lessons are like chapters in a book. Each one teaches you something new about creating apps. They include explanations, examples, and tips to help you understand.
features.howToUse: Click on any lesson card to open it. Read through the content at your own pace. Use the navigation arrows to move between sections.

features.name: Exercises
features.description: Exercises are where you practice what you've learned. They're like puzzles that help you apply your knowledge in a fun way.
features.howToUse: Follow the instructions in each exercise. Type your answer in the provided space. Don't worry about getting it perfect - you can try as many times as you want!

features.name: Progress Tracking
features.description: Your progress tracker shows how much you've completed. It's like a report card that shows your learning journey.
features.howToUse: Check your progress anytime on the dashboard. Green bars mean completed, yellow means in progress, and gray means not started yet.

features.name: Achievements
features.description: Achievements are special rewards you earn for reaching milestones. They celebrate your hard work and motivate you to keep going!
features.howToUse: Achievements unlock automatically when you hit certain goals. Check your achievement page to see what you've earned and what's coming next.

features.name: Code Playground
features.description: The playground is where you can experiment and try things out safely. It's like a sandbox where you can build and test without breaking anything.
features.howToUse: Use the playground to test ideas, practice coding, or just have fun experimenting with what you've learned.

faq.question: I'm completely new to coding. Can I still use Apper Academy?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Apper Academy is designed for beginners. We start with the basics and explain everything in simple terms. You don't need any prior experience - just curiosity and willingness to learn!

faq.question: How long does it take to complete a lesson?
faq.answer: Most lessons take 15-30 minutes to complete. But don't worry about time - go at your own pace. Some people prefer to take their time, while others move quickly. There's no right or wrong speed!

faq.question: What if I get stuck on an exercise?
faq.answer: Getting stuck is totally normal and part of learning! Try reading the lesson content again, look at the examples, or take a break and come back later. Remember, you can attempt exercises as many times as you want.

faq.question: Can I skip lessons or do them out of order?
faq.answer: You can explore any lesson that interests you! However, we recommend following the suggested order, especially if you're new to app development, as lessons build on previous concepts.

faq.question: How do I track my progress?
faq.answer: Your progress is automatically saved as you complete lessons and exercises. Check the progress bars on your dashboard to see how you're doing. Completed items show in green!

faq.question: What are achievements and how do I earn them?
faq.answer: Achievements are special badges you earn for reaching milestones, like completing your first lesson or finishing a series of exercises. They unlock automatically - just keep learning and you'll earn them!

faq.question: Can I use Apper Academy on my phone or tablet?
faq.answer: Yes! Apper Academy works on phones, tablets, and computers. The interface adapts to your screen size, so you can learn anywhere, anytime.

faq.question: Is my progress saved automatically?
faq.answer: Yes! Everything you do is saved automatically. You can close the app and come back later, and your progress will be right where you left it.

tips.title: Take Your Time
tips.description: Learning is not a race. Take time to understand each concept before moving on. It's better to understand one thing well than to rush through many things.

tips.title: Practice Regularly
tips.description: Even 15 minutes a day can make a big difference. Consistent practice helps you remember what you've learned and builds confidence.

tips.title: Don't Fear Mistakes
tips.description: Mistakes are learning opportunities! Every expert was once a beginner who made lots of mistakes. Embrace them and learn from them.

tips.title: Experiment in the Playground
tips.description: Use the code playground to try new things. It's a safe space to experiment and see what happens when you change different parts of the code.

tips.title: Celebrate Small Wins
tips.description: Completed an exercise? Understood a new concept? Celebrate these moments! Learning is made up of many small victories.
